short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your favourite articles to Airvoie-Pedia to see them converted to audio for consumption

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are building an audio-first e-learning platform for listeners to learn new skills on the go daily.

The world is getting increasingly busier & we donâ€™t have enough screen time to learn every day; hence we have started to resort to podcasts, audiobooks & live audio. They are great but long, draggy & conversational, which is orthogonal to the human learning model resulting in more passive consumption than active learning. We aim to bridge that gap - to not just listen but learn.

This Extension is a first step to a new beginning for audio based consumption. Convert and learn articles on the go. and we would convert these articles in humanized versions and you can hear them from our app.

Currently, we have built a web & mobile app (Android and iOS)

What Airvoice does today:
Streams informative, byte-sized & structured audio content by industry experts, which listeners can learn on their schedule.
Transcriptions, chapter summaries, workbooks & resources to promote active learning in listeners.
Flashcards & Quizzes to help listeners not just learn but also to retain information.
Lets creators create exclusive audio courses & monetize them easily.
